purpose: Barrel export file that re-exports all type aliases from the types subdirectory. This file allows importing all types from a single import path.

sections.title: Exports
sections.description: All exports are re-exported from their respective modules:
points: global - Exports: JsonOK<T>, JsonFailed, MW, Service, Route, MainRouter, AddAuditRecord, LangOptions, EntityOptions

firebase_types - Exports: Query function types (QueryDocument, QueryDocuments, QueryDocumentOptional, etc.), Snapshot types (OnSnapshotConfig, Snapshot, SnapshotBulk, etc.), WhereCondition, InitSnapshotsOptions

context: This barrel export pattern allows consumers to import multiple types from a single import statement, improving code organization and reducing import complexity.
